article.title: Apple's $349 A16 iPad Supports Final Cut Pro - MacRumors
article.description: The low-cost iPad that Apple released this week with an A16 chip is able to run Final Cut Pro for iPad, according to the Final Cut Pro App Store...

tweet_text:
Whoa! Editing pro video on a $349 iPad?🤯 Apple's A16 chip powering Final Cut Pro on the new iPad is a game-changer.  Is this the beginning of truly mobile professional creative workflows?  #iPad #FinalCutPro  What do you think?

https://www.macrumors.com/2025/03/14/a16-ipad-final-cut-pro-support/
